page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The 12 square kilometre block studied by Castle Rock High School,Bardon Hill Church of England Primary and Warren Hills Primary School comprises three very different areas. There is a large residential suburb of {Coalville}with schools,churches and small shops;the village of{Bardon {Hill}(pop.c 200) which has grown up around a quarry,near to the A50 and situated just below Bardon Hill (461132) and lastly farmland. Before the residential development the whole area was of rough pasture and mixed woodland.The eastern side of the area has remained unchanged.It is part of{Charnwood Forest},an area of low hills of which Bardon is the highest.
